channel.title: Help with [pi] please

item.title: Help with [pi] please
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

is getMinutes supposed to be an integer, also you don’t add a “;” to the end of an if condition.

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerShield] == 13663) { if (c.getMinutes() == 10) { c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 5); c.sendMessage("..."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Help with [pi] please
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

This is the code I use in CombatAssistant.java:

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerShield] == 13663) { if (c.getMinutes == 10); c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 5); c.sendMessage("..."); }
This is the error i get:

src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:881: error: cannot find symbol if (c.getMinutes == 10); ^ symbol: variable getMinutes location: variable c of type Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
How would I fix this?

Read full topic
